description: For the first time since I´ve started this little project of mine, I´ve met a boy who was completely honest with me and told me the true reason why he is in debts. Once I´ve asked him he simply replied " because I am young and stupid, I´ve partied a lot and spent more than I´ve earned.". This honesty was a real turn on for me. And the one and only reason why I am so successful in finding young money-hungry dudes every week. After we summed up his debts, I just told him what I want from him. To obey my wishes and orders for an hour. And I have to say he was very humble and obedient. The blow job was just awesome. He knew that he has to pay for his stupidity, to get back on track and pay off his debts.
title: Debt Dandy 61
